comment: Terribly hard class. she made this class very difficult. they should have gave all students who took her class a refund! she made all of her lectures extremely complicated. more than half of the class dropped after the midterm.
She got fired, or left, but we are pretty sure she was at least asked to leave. I did not know a single person who got even a B much less an A. She made this class ridiculously hard for ALGEBRA!

she makes this easy college algebra material very difficult to understand. she gives homework every class and has either a test or a homework quiz every friday. a very difficult instructor. although, she speaks english and has nice handwriting which is hard to find at SPSU.
She grades homework weekly, and takes simple mathematics from high school and throws confusing terminology to make the student more confused

Nice lady I guess but I HATED HER CLASS. She makes this weird face when is reading something in her head or writting on the board. I HATED when she did that. But thats just me. I did not learn anything. I tought myself.
I wouldnt recommend her. Her tests are really hard and her study guides are worthless.

Sorry, but I would NOT recommend her to any student that truly wants to pass pre-cal, after passing her class, you end up forgetting all, and you don't really learn, it's hard, and rigurous, and rude...

She is a nice lady, but she can't explain very well. She rushes through the semester b/c there "isn't enough" time. Her tests are VERY DIFFICULT. Unless you are really good at math, do not take her class.
She lectures the entire class which is good, but her tests are hard. She gives a study guide, but nothing like the test. If you are good at math take her.
